H0.text: Which poet's house at 24 Hollies Street, London, was commemorated by the first Blue Plaque, unveiled in 1867. John Keats

H1.text: Which poet's house at 24 Hollies Street, London, was commemorated by the first Blue Plaque, unveiled in 1867. Percy Bysshe Shelley

H2.text: Which poet's house at 24 Hollies Street, London, was commemorated by the first Blue Plaque, unveiled in 1867. Robert Browning

H3.text: Which poet's house at 24 Hollies Street, London, was commemorated by the first Blue Plaque, unveiled in 1867. Byron

A4.text: The first plaque was unveiled in 1867 to commemorate Lord Byron at his birthplace, 24 Holles Street, Cavendish Square.
